mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, r.region_name, u.user_birthdate, u.user_createtime, k.rank_name FROM user u INNER JOIN region r INNER JOIN rank k ON u.region_id = r.region_id and u.rank_id = k.rank_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT qb.question_id, qb.question_title, u.user_id, qb.question_datetime FROM question_board qb INNER JOIN user u ON qb.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY qb.question_datetime DESC LIMIT 0, 6;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_board q Inner Join user u ON q.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT MONTH(question_datetime) AS question_month, IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as count FROM ( SELECT question_datetime, user_id from question_board WHERE YEAR(question_datetime) = YEAR(NOW()) )t INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY question_month

SELECT qb.question_id, qb.question_title, qb.question_datetime FROM question_board qb INNER JOIN USER u on qb.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY question_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT qc.question_comment_id, u.user_id, qc.question_comment_content, qc.question_id, qc.question_comment_datetime FROM question_comment qc INNER JOIN user u ON qc.user_id = u.user_id AND u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY qc.question_comment_datetime DESC LIMIT 0,6

SELECT qb.question_id, qc.question_comment_id, qc.question_comment_datetime, qc.question_comment_content FROM question_comment qc INNER JOIN USER u INNER JOIN question_board qb ON qc.user_id = u.user_id AND qc.question_id = qb.question_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY qc.question_comment_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT MONTH(answer_datetime) AS question_month, IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as count FROM ( SELECT answer_datetime, user_id FROM answer WHERE YEAR(answer_datetime) = YEAR(NOW()) )t INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY question_month
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_comment qc Inner Join user u ON qc.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.answer_id, concat(substring(a.answer_content,1,20),'...')AS answer_content, a.answer_datetime, qb.question_id, u.user_id FROM answer a INNER JOIN user u INNER JOIN question_board qb ON a.user_id = u.user_id AND a.question_id = qb.question_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.answer_datetime DESC LIMIT 0,6

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM answer a Inner Join user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
